DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the adequacy of mask ventilation with the different sized-oropharyngeal airway.
DOC.brief_title: Gender and Proper Size of Oropharyngeal Airway: Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: adult patients undergoing surgery that requires general anesthesia anticipated difficult intubation patients without teeth or with loose teeth cervical spine disease body mass index over 35 kg/m2 pregnancy
